text: Hello everyone, I have never been involved in development before. Upon a colleague's recommendation, I started learning HubSpot, but I got stuck on the "CMS for Developers" course. I decided to create a theme using design tools and I have created the header, footer, and all other elements. If someone who has already passed the certification has a zip file, could you please send it to me so I can see how it's done? Thank you in advance, everyone.
